scripts.update-stack: aws cloudformation update-stack --stack-name urlcheck-probe --template-url https://s3.amazonaws.com/urlcheck-probe/template.yml --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameters ParameterKey=ApiUrlParameter,ParameterValue=$npm_package_config_api_url ParameterKey=ChunkSizeParameter,ParameterValue=$npm_package_config_chunk_size && aws cloudformation wait stack-update-complete --stack-name urlcheck-probe
scripts.create-stack: aws cloudformation create-stack --stack-name urlcheck-probe --template-url https://s3.amazonaws.com/urlcheck-probe/template.yml --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameters ParameterKey=ApiUrlParameter,ParameterValue=$npm_package_config_api_url ParameterKey=ChunkSizeParameter,ParameterValue=$npm_package_config_chunk_size && aws cloudformation wait stack-create-complete --stack-name urlcheck-probe
scripts.upload-deploy: zip -r deploy.zip index.js node_modules && aws s3 cp deploy.zip s3://urlcheck-probe/deploy.zip
scripts.create: npm run upload-deploy && npm run upload-template && npm run create-stack
scripts.update: npm run upload-template && npm run update-stack
scripts.update-code: npm run upload-deploy && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name urlcheck-probe-check-acquire --s3-bucket urlcheck-probe --s3-key deploy.zip && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name urlcheck-probe-check-probe --s3-bucket urlcheck-probe --s3-key deploy.zip
scripts.delete: aws cloudformation delete-stack --stack-name urlcheck-probe && aws cloudformation wait stack-delete-complete --stack-name urlcheck-probe
